dct_title_s: Map of the Gold Regions in California
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights.
Shows topography, drainage, counties, cities and towns, roads.
Includes western edge of Nevada including Pyramid Lake.

Collector's notes: This map is a reduced size version of the Tassin map, also published by Cooke and LeCounte, 1851; the mapping is identical. The Streeter copy and [this copy] are the only two known copies of this map, thus rarer than the Tassin map.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Warren Heckrotte Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.  If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
